              ["Avoiding the usage of "],
              ["!important", [["c"]]],
              [
                " is strongly recommended (unless absolutely necessary), because it will disturb the natural flow of css rules which can bring uncertainty in your style sheet. Also it is important to note that when multiple "
              ],
              ["!important", [["c"]]],
              [
                " declarations are applied to the same rule on a certain element, the one with the higher specificity will be the ona applied."
